category.name: Classification
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: ICS_admin_requires_dba
preference.preference_description: Give NON-DBA users access to the Classification Admin. Application. Valid Values: true/false. true - User requires dba privileges to access Classification Admin. false - User has access to Classification Admin. If you allow non-dba users to log into Classification Admin., please note that the users will have full read/write access! To protect the hierarchy, the dictionary, and the KeyLOVs from unauthorized access, they need to be protected using the AccessControl tab.
